name: BOX STAR BOX
description:
It is a magnificent journey for becoming a star ...

BOX STAR BOX was created with simple operation and a difficult game level!

· The only thing you can do is tilt the box.

· It is difficult to go even on a flat road if you do not get used to it.

· The spectacle that awaits you at the end of your journey is ...

· Since this game is an indie game, at the beginning I will be covered by my own expenses ...
